title: Adobe Analytics Cloud Experience Event Extension
description: Adobe Analytics Cloud Experience Event Extension.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.title: Session Number
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.description: Current session number for the end-user.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.title: Session Depth
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.description: Current session depth (eg page number) for the end-user.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.title: Session Entry Timestamp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.description: The timestamp at the entry into this session. Milliseconds since midnight of January 1, 1970.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.title: Session Entry Search
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.description: The information related to web or mobile search at the entry of this session.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.title: Session Entry Web
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.description: The information related to web page, link, and referrer at the entry of this session.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.title: End User First Timestamp
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.description: The timestamp for the first ExperienceEvent for this end-user. Milliseconds since midnight of January 1, 1970.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.title: End User First Web Details
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/analytic.description: The information related to web page, link, and referrer from the first ExperienceEvent for this end-user.
